ping.return: Send the ping of this bot

say.return: Send the message of the user

profile.return: Send a embed speaking all the information of the user

about-me.return: Set your about-me to the spoken text

myimg.return: Set your image from your profile

avatar.return: Send a embed with the member image

born.return: Set your born date and your age

slap.return: Send a random gif slapping the mentioned member

punch.return: Send a random gif punching the mentioned member
